attributes.action: Energy suppliers and Oil companies to pay back 2022 increase in profits.
attributes.additional_details: It is a matter of social justice and it requires the government's urgent intervention.
attributes.background: Legislate to force UK Energy suppliers and Oil companies operating in the UK to pay back 2022 year-on-year increase in profits to all customers in the form of subsidies.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase the windfall tax on energy companies and apply it retroactively: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623277

Apply an ‘excess profits’ tax on oil and gas companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623719
